Their imprisonment, as well as the way many families were treated after, remains one of America's most shameful acts.

I remember watching the violence that was taking place in the halls of Congress ‚Äì in the very building I had assured my family was the safest place in the country.

What happened one year ago today was a national tragedy. 

I had just returned to my office from watching the proceedings in the House Chambers and saw the rioters breaking in the building on television.

On January 6, 2021, I wasn‚Äôt sad, I wasn‚Äôt scared -- I was mad. 

One year later, I‚Äôm determined.
